breads.heading: Breads
intro: We use only top-quality grains, stone-milled at the bakery less than 24 hours before baking.
Our flours undergo no sifting (separation); every component of the grain is preserved in its entirety. No added gluten.

sourdough.heading: Sourdough Breads
sourdough.note: The sourdough culture consists only of water and flour from the same grain as the bread.

items.name: Spelt
items.ingredients: Spelt, water, sourdough culture, sea salt.

items.name: Kamut
items.ingredients: Kamut, water, sourdough culture, sea salt.

items.name: 16 Grains (Wheat-Free)
items.ingredients: Water, kamut, spelt, sourdough culture, 11 milled grains (barley, oats, rye, rice, green lentils, spelt, soy, buckwheat, corn, millet, flax), sea salt, millet, hemp, amaranth, flax.

items.name: Wheat with Sesame or Sunflower
items.ingredients: Wheat, water, sourdough culture, sesame or sunflower, sea salt.

items.name: Rye (Friday only)
items.ingredients: Rye, water, sourdough culture, sea salt.

yeast.heading: Yeast Breads
yeast.note: Except for the raisin bread, which contains honey.

items.name: Raisin
items.ingredients: Wheat, water, Thompson raisins, unpasteurized honey, sea salt, yeast.

items.name: Protein
items.ingredients: Wheat, water, sunflower seeds, sea salt, millet, yeast, flax, soy flour, whole sesame, soy milk powder.

items.name: 12 Grains
items.ingredients: Wheat, water, 12 milled grains (barley, oats, rye, rice, green lentils, spelt, soy, buckwheat, corn, wheat, millet, flax), sea salt, millet, yeast, flax.

items.name: Corn
items.ingredients: Wheat, water, corn, sea salt, millet, yeast, flax.

items.name: Oat Bran and Flax
items.ingredients: Wheat, water, oat bran, flax, sea salt, yeast.

treats.heading: Baked Goods
intro: Developed through many trials, our recipes combine the flavors of fresh fruits, the richness of dried fruits (natural sweeteners), and the nutritional qualities of whole grains milled daily at the bakery.
In all our muffins, fruit is always the first ingredient.

items.name: Banana and Cocoa (Rye)
items.ingredients: Fresh bananas, whole rye, dates, canola oil, flaxseed decoction, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder.

items.name: Cranberry and Lemon (Kamut)
items.ingredients: Cranberries, whole kamut, dates, canola oil, flaxseed decoction, lemon zest, baking soda, baking powder.

items.name: Queen Elizabeth (Oats)
items.ingredients: Coconut, whole oats, dates, walnuts, canola oil, flaxseed decoction, baking soda, baking powder.
